result.eng: I'll see you at three o'clock.

result.eng: If you wait a second I'll ask him.

result.eng: If you forgive me, I'll never disobey your advice again.

result.orig: Má mhaitheann tú dom é ní rachaidh mé thar do chomhairle go deo arís

result.eng: I can't promise anything but I'll do my best.

result.eng: I wasn't here last week because I was ill.

result.eng: I'll see you on Friday night, God willing.

result.eng: Goodbye, Éilís. I'll see you tomorrow.
result.ga: Slán leat a Éilís Feicfidh mé amárach tú

result.eng: Goodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.
result.ga: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárach
result.orig: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárach
result.html: Slán leat a Shiobhán Beidh mé ag caint leat amárachGoodbye, Siobhán. I'll be talking to you tomorrow.

result.eng: Goodbye, Séamas. I'll see you tomorrow.

result.eng: I'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ga: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.orig: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraige
result.html: Inseoidh mise do m'athair air é ach é a theacht ón fharraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.
result.ponchtml: Inseoiḋ mise do m'aṫair air é aċ é a ṫeaċt ón ḟarraigeI'll tell my father on him as soon as he comes from the sea.

result.eng: It's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ga: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.orig: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.html: Is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ponchtml: Is maiṫ a rinne tú an ḟírinne a inse agus ar a ẛon sin ní ḃainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.

result.eng: I'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.html: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féinI'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfaiḋ mé air a ċuid smugaċán díṁúinte a ċoinneáil aige féinI'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.

result.eng: When I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ga: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.orig: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.html: Nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃeas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfiḋ mé fá do ċoinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.

result.eng: I'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ga: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.orig: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.html: Beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duitI'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ mise anseo fá do ċoinne ag teaċt duitI'll be here for you when you come back.
